Flow.description: Richemont Service Cloud - Process to create the ConsentUpdate platform event each time a consent has been updated

value.stringValue: AND ( NOT( ISNEW() ), [Account].IsPersonAccount, AND( NOT( ISBLANK([Account].RICSC_ClientID__c) ), NOT( ISBLANK([Account].RICSC_SWSEID__c) ), NOT( ISBLANK( TEXT([Account].RICSC_SourceCRM__c) ) ) ), [Account].RICSC_CanBeContacted__c != PRIORVALUE([Account].RICSC_CanBeContacted__c) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_1
formulas.expression: AND ( NOT( ISNEW() ), {!myVariable_current.IsPersonAccount}, AND( NOT( ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.RICSC_ClientID__c}) ), NOT( ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.RICSC_SWSEID__c}) ), NOT( ISBLANK( TEXT({!myVariable_current.RICSC_SourceCRM__c}) ) ) ), {!myVariable_current.RICSC_CanBeContacted__c} != PRIORVALUE({!myVariable_current.RICSC_CanBeContacted__c}) )

value.stringValue: AND ( NOT( ISNEW() ), [Account].IsPersonAccount, NOT( ISBLANK( [Account].RICSC_ClientID__c) ), NOT( ISBLANK( TEXT([Account].RICSC_SourceCRM__c) ) ), OR ( [Account].RICSC_CanBeContacted__c != PRIORVALUE([Account].RICSC_CanBeContacted__c), [Account].RICSC_VoiceContact__c != PRIORVALUE([Account].RICSC_VoiceContact__c), [Account].RICSC_PostalContact__c != PRIORVALUE([Account].RICSC_PostalContact__c), [Account].RICSC_ElectronicContact__c != PRIORVALUE([Account].RICSC_ElectronicContact__c) ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_6
formulas.expression: AND ( NOT( ISNEW() ), {!myVariable_current.IsPersonAccount}, NOT( ISBLANK( {!myVariable_current.RICSC_ClientID__c}) ), NOT( ISBLANK( TEXT({!myVariable_current.RICSC_SourceCRM__c}) ) ), OR ( {!myVariable_current.RICSC_CanBeContacted__c} != PRIORVALUE({!myVariable_current.RICSC_CanBeContacted__c}), {!myVariable_current.RICSC_VoiceContact__c} != PRIORVALUE({!myVariable_current.RICSC_VoiceContact__c}), {!myVariable_current.RICSC_PostalContact__c} != PRIORVALUE({!myVariable_current.RICSC_PostalContact__c}), {!myVariable_current.RICSC_ElectronicContact__c} != PRIORVALUE({!myVariable_current.RICSC_ElectronicContact__c}) ) )

Flow.label: CreateConsentPlatformEvent
